queries.text: What are the main customer complaints this month?
Show me the positive feedback trends
Analyze quarterly sales performance and customer sentiment
Compare product satisfaction across different categories
What do customers say about our pricing and value?
Identify trends in annual customer feedback
How is our new feature performing with users?

sample_feedback.text: Q4 sales exceeded expectations! Our revenue grew 35% year-over-year. The new product line is performing exceptionally well with fantastic customer response.
Average order value increased to $127 this quarter, up from $98 last year. Premium products are driving excellent margins and customer satisfaction is very high.
Product Category A consistently outperforms others with average customer rating of 4.8/5 and 92% repeat purchase rate. Customers love the quality and reliability.
Annual review shows disappointing results in customer retention. Only 68% retention rate this year compared to 78% industry average. Need urgent improvement.
Our newest product launch was amazing! First month sales hit $2.1M, exceeding forecast by 40%. Customer reviews are overwhelmingly positive with 4.9 star average.
Quarterly customer satisfaction scores are mixed. Overall CSAT is 7.2/10 - decent but not great. Support response times need improvement to reach our 8.5 target.
Regional sales analysis reveals outstanding performance in East region (+45%) and West region (+38%). Excellent work by sales teams with great customer engagement!
Product returns increased to 8.5% this quarter, up from 5.2% last year. Poor quality control issues with Batch 2024-Q4. Customers are very unhappy and frustrated.
Annual revenue reached $12.4M, achieving 28% growth over last year! Fantastic team performance across all departments. Customer base expanded by 2,400 new accounts.
Cross-sell performance is excellent with average 2.3 products per customer, up from 1.8 last year. Customers appreciate our product recommendations and bundling options.
Customer support metrics show terrible results this month. Average wait time is 12 minutes vs 3 minute target. Response quality scores dropped to 6.8/10. Need immediate action.
Premium tier customers show outstanding loyalty with 95% renewal rate and $1,850 average annual value. These customers love our exclusive features and priority support.
